node.doctext:
«name»,

You are receiving this mail because someone asked for a password reset link for your account at «servername». If this was not you, you can safely delete this message and forget about it.

To reset your password, click on the following link, or copy and paste it into your web browser:

https://«servername»«link»

All the best,

The Everything2 Staff
«servername»
node.title: Everything2 password reset
